properties.markdown:
# IMPORTANT - This Dashboard is Automatically Deployed by CloudFormation!
## If you manually edit anything your changes will be lost on the next CloudFormation deployment
 
If you wish to retain any manual changes then:

1. Select **Actions** dropdown above, then **View/edit source**
2. Copy the JSON source using **Copy source** button
3. Update the relevant source file in the code repository (exact filename is important): e.g. **'./dashboards/dashboard-<StageName>.json'** if using unique dashboard or **'./dashboards/dashboard-template.json'** if not 
4. Check in the change
5. On the next deployment your changes will be preserved. Using unique dashboard: <UniqueDashboard>
